BreadcrumbDescription: I must submit to Angel Inarius for his judgment. Only then can I hope to be blessed and travel beyond the Black Lake in pursuit of Lilith.
Callback87Header: Climb the stairs of the Hall of Ascension
Callback93Header: Enter the Portal of Father's Radiance to submit to Inarius
Name: Light's Judgment
Phase47Description: Now that I have completed the pilgrimage, I must enter the Alabaster Monastery and submit to Inarius for his judgment.
Phase85Description: I have entered the Alabaster Monastery. Whatever fate I am to receive awaits me there.
Phase85OutsideSubzoneHeader: Climb the stairs of the Hall of Ascension
Phase91Description: I have entered the Alabaster Monastery. Whatever fate I am to receive awaits me there.
